alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Vernon Parish through 700 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Polk, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Polk, New Llano, Cravens, Fullerton and Pickering. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
